title: Mercury Transit in the 12th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Mercury transiting your twelfth house redirects mental energy inward, toward reflection, privacy, and subtle processing. Thoughts become introspective, intuitive, and less outwardly expressed. You may prefer working behind the scenes, researching quietly, or planning without disclosure. Communication reduces externally but deepens internally. When guided consciously, this transit supports strategic solitude, mental detox, spiritual insight, and preparation for a fresh cycle of expression without confusion or mental drain.

sections.heading: Finance
points: Less focus on gains, more on release.

closing: Mercury in the 12th house closes a mental cycle. When silence is used wisely, clarity and readiness for renewal naturally emerge.
